snippet: The Takacs String Quartet based two Zankel Hall concerts on relative rarities by Britten, Janacek, Debussy and Ravel.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews two performances of classical music works by the Takacs String Quartet at Zankel Hall.
lead_paragraph: The Takacs String Quartet based two Zankel Hall concerts on relative rarities by Britten, Janacek, Debussy and Ravel.

headline.seo: Takacs Quartet Plays Britten and Janacek at Zankel Hall
headline.main: Some Side Dishes Served Up as a Varied Main Course
headline.print_headline: Some Side Dishes Served Up As a Varied Main Course
